name: Captain Jack's Revenge
description:
This is my First Real Game Jam so i had some trouble with the upload. i hope you enjoy my submission. i sure enjoyed making it.

Someone Has stolen Captain Jack' treasure. Help him delve deep into the caves where the thieving critters are hiding and help him get his revenge.

Move and jump with arrow keys. You Can Double jump and there is a sustained jump too.
Throw bombs with space. If you hold space a ghost trail will show you where your bombs will go. 
Num4 and Num6 control throw strength and 
Num8 and Num2 control the throw angle.

Find The ShortCuts
Find The Coins
Find the Big Boss

But watch your step.
